name: Cryptid Party
description:
So, what’s Cryptid Party?

Cryptid Party is a walking simulator in which the player hosts a house party for Cryptids in an ultimate plot to summon the party god, attending to each guest’s needs to ensure the night ends with a bang!

FEATURES!

  • An expansive house filled with detailed rooms to explore with new areas to unlock as you progress, such as the pool!
  • A party that populates in size as the mood of the party continues to increase, keep those guests happy!
  • 7 unique Cryptids to interact with, each with their own animations, sound effects and items to find within the many rooms, closets, and cupboards of the house!
  • Bright, vibrant illustrations for each object and cryptid the player encounters!
  • Music by Hallow Planet Theory, stream their stuff on Soundcloud! - https://soundcloud.com/hollowplaneteer?utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_...

FEATURES TO COME!

As Cryptid Party is currently in development, here’s a list of some features to expect within upcoming builds!

  • Dynamic music that shifts and builds up as the party continues to populate with guests.
  • Multiple new additional Cryptids to find both in and around the house!
  • More objects and background characters to interact with around the house! (Coolers, party food, dance floors etc.)
  • Access to the garage and basement of the house.
  • Access to the front door, allowing the player to bring the party to the streets!
  • The final ritual to summon the Party God!!
